attributes.action: Remove and Ban the group "Dead Baby Jokes" off of Facebook and any other networking site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A group has been started on Facebook - every1 please join this 2 get the dead baby joke group banned from facebook, this is to try and get another group called "Dead Baby Jokes" removed and banned. If these people wish to joke about such a sensitive matter privately that is their choice however publicly starting a fan group about this is just unspeakable let alone insensitive. There are laws to protect children from abuse and violation. There are laws to stop discrimination against a number of things, surely this fits into those categories somehow. The group already has over 5000 members who are all passionate about getting this group removed, please help further...

rejection.details: Please raise your concerns directly with Facebook.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
